description: Try our easy to follow Baked Cheesy Spinach Dip With Garlic Pita Breads recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Baked Cheesy Spinach Dip With Garlic Pita Breads Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cup Dairyworks Tasty Cheese Grated, grated
0.75 cup Chobani No Fat Plain Yoghurt
500g Bell Farms chopped spinach, thawed, rinsed, drained
50g Dairyworks Garlic & Sea Salt Butter, melted

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180Â°C, fan bake.
In a large bowl mix together sour cream and natural yoghurt.
Add garlic, onion & spinach and combine. Lastly add the Dairyworks Tasty Grated Cheese and mix well.
Transfer dip to a small baking dish and spread evenly.
Place in oven for 10-15 minutes until cheese is nice and melted.
Prepare garlic pita breads by drizzling melted Dairyworks Garlic & Sea Salt Butter over sliced pita breads.
Bake for 10-12 minutes until golden brown.
Serve the Baked Spinach Dip warm, with pita breads on the side for dipping.
